title: SPIDER-MAN BY TODD MCFARLANE: THE COMPLETE COLLECTION
author: Todd McFarlane
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Collects Spider-Man (1990) #1-14, 16; X-Force (1991) #4. The book that transformed comics! Todd McFarlane became a superstar illustrating AMAZING SPIDER-MAN, but he changed the industry forever with his next project: the ""adjectiveless"" SPIDER-MAN! Taking on both writing and art duties, McFarlane ushered Peter Parker into a gritty new era - and it began with ""Torment""! When the Big Apple's streets run red with blood, the web-slinger heads into the sewers to stop the Lizard's homicidal rampage. But what is driving his old friend and foe? Plus: Ghost Rider lends a bony hand when the deranged Hobgoblin returns, the wall-crawler finds himself at the center of a clash of claws between Wolverine and Wendigo and Pete goes back in black to face Morbius the Living Vampire! And in the ultimate nineties team-up, Spidey joins X-Force to battle the unstoppable Juggernaut!

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the art quality great, clean, and cool. They say it's wonderful to revisit these stories and a great trip down memory lane. Opinions differ on the color accuracy, with some finding the pages full-color and thick, while others say the paper is thin and looks cheap.

title: All-star Batman
author: Scott Snyder
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: New York Times best-selling author Scott Snyder teams with top tier artists to tell a Batman story like you’ve never seen before!Acclaimed writer Scott Snyder joins forces with legendary artists including John Romita Jr. and BATMAN: THE BLACK MIRROR collaborator, Jock, to bring fans a Batman tale like no other. Snyder and team dive into Batman’s complicated relationships with some of the greatest villains of popular culture, with a modern sensibility.What does a road trip with disgraced district attorney Harvey Dent, now the villainous Two-Face, look like? Then dive into chilling tales featuring Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy.  Finally, the mastermind behind these villains and there twisted end goal will be revealed!

title: Watchmen
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Alan Moore
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Watchmen, the groundbreaking series from award-winning author Alan Moore, presents a world where the mere presence of American superheroes changed history--the U.S. won the Vietnam War, Nixon is still president, and the Cold War is in full effect.Considered the greatest graphic novel in the history of the medium, the Hugo Award-winning story chronicles the fall from grace of a group of superheroes plagued by all-too-human failings. Along the way, the concept of the superhero is dissected as an unknown assassin stalks the erstwhile heroes.This edition of Watchmen, the groundbreaking series from Alan Moore, the award-winning author of V For Vendetta and Batman: The Killing Joke, features art from industry legend Dave Gibbons, with high-quality, recolored pages found in Watchmen: Absolute Edition.

title: Batman: Year One Deluxe
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Frank Miller
breadCrumbs: Books › Teen & Young Adult › Literature & Fiction
bookDescription: In 1986, Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli produced this groundbreaking reinterpretation of the origin of Batman—who he is, and how he came to be. Sometimes careless and naive, this Dark Knight is far from the flawless vigilante he is today. In his first year on the job, Batman feels his way around a Gotham City far darker than the one he left. His solemn vow to extinguish the town’s criminal element is only half the battle; along with Lieutenant James Gordon, the Dark Knight must also fight a police force more corrupt than the scum in the streets.Batman: Year One stands next to Batman: The Dark Knight Returns on the mantle of greatest Batman graphic novels of all time. Timeless in its appeal, Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli’s masterpiece would stand apart from the crowded comics field even today.This edition includes the complete graphic novel, a new introduction by writer Frank Miller and a new illustrated afterword by artist David Mazzucchelli. Completing this collection are over 40 pages of never-before-seen developmental material such as character and layout sketches, sample script pages, sketches, and more that pro-vide a glimpse into the making of this contemporary classic.This volume collects Batman #404-407.

title: Batman the Killing Joke: The Deluxe Edition
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Alan Moore
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Critically acclaimed author Alan Moore redefined graphic novel story-telling with Watchmen and V for Vendetta. In Batman: The Killing Joke, he takes on the origin of comics' greatest super-villain, The Joker, and changes Batman's world forever.ONE BAD DAY.According to the grinning engine of madness and mayhem known as the Joker, that's all that separates the sane from the psychotic. Freed once again from the confines of Arkham Asylum, he's out to prove his deranged point. And he's going to use Gotham City's top cop, Commissioner Jim Gordon, and his brilliant and beautiful daughter Barbara to do it.Now Batman must race to stop his archnemesis before his reign of terror claims two of the Dark Knight's closest friends. Can he finally put an end to the cycle of bloodlust and lunacy that links these two iconic foes before it leads to its fatal conclusion? And as the horrifying origin of the Clown Prince of Crime is finally revealed, will the thin line that separates Batman's nobility and the Joker's insanity snap once and for all?Legendary writer Alan Moore redefined the superhero with Watchmen and V For Vendetta. In Batman: The Killing Joke, he takes on the origin of comics' greatest super-villain, the Joker--and changes Batman's world forever.Stunningly illustrated, Batman: The Killing Joke The Deluxe Edition has been lushly recolored by artist Brian Bolland, presenting his original vision of this modern classic. This new edition includes Batman: The Killing Joke and stories from Batman: Black and White #4 and Countdown #31, along with numerous Batman and Joker covers and sketches by Brian Bolland, including artwork only previously published in the Absolute edition!

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the story compelling, captivating, and classic. They appreciate the breathtaking artwork and vibrant colors. Readers say the book is worth the money and definitely worth looking back over.

title: The Complete Calvin and Hobbes
inStockText: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
author: Bill Watterson
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Join Calvin and Hobbes on all their adventures in this three-volume hardcover collection of every comic strip from the comic strip’s eleven year history (1985 to1996).Calvin and Hobbes is unquestionably one of the most popular comic strips of all time. The imaginative world of a boy and his real-only-to-him tiger was first syndicated in 1985 and appeared in more than 2,400 newspapers when Bill Watterson retired on January 1, 1996. The entire body of Calvin and Hobbes cartoons published in a truly noteworthy tribute to this singular cartoon in The Complete Calvin and Hobbes. Composed of three hardcover, four-color volumes in a sturdy slipcase, this New York Times best-selling edition includes all Calvin and Hobbes cartoons that ever appeared in syndication. This is the treasure that all Calvin and Hobbes fans seek.

title: The Action Bible: God's Redemptive Story
author: Sergio Cariello
breadCrumbs: Books › Children's Books › Religions
bookDescription:
The Action Bible presents more than 230 fast-paced narratives in chronological order, making it easy to follow the Bible’s historical flow and building up to the thrilling climax of God’s redemptive story.   Plus, these spectacular updates take the action to a whole new level:   25 new stories showcase a more extensive exploration of God’s work in our lives.23 expanded stories highlight additional experiences of the people who tell God’s story.128 new pages of illustrations deliver a richer artistic experience with more close-up faces, historical details, and dramatic colors.   Every page sparks excitement to explore God’s Word and know Him personally. Readers will witness God’s active presence in the world through stories from the life of Jesus and great heroes of the faith.   Let this blend of powerful imagery and clear storytelling capture your imagination and instill the truth that invites you to discover your own adventure of life with God.   Sergio Cariello’s illustrations for The Action Bible leap off the page with the same thrilling energy that earned him international recognition for his work with Marvel Comics and DC Comics.

title: Knowledge Encyclopedia: Animals (Knowledge Encyclopedia For Children)
author: Wonder House Books
breadCrumbs: Books › Children's Books › Education & Reference
bookDescription: Who were the first animals on Earth? What differentiates a reptile from an amphibian? How do mammals give birth? What do insects eat? This encyclopedia will answer these and more hows and whats for you. Learning is made simpler with well-labelled diagrams and an extensive glossary of difficult words. Bonus: the engrossing book comes loaded with Isn’ t It Amazing— a section of fun facts to keep you glued for more. This encyclopedia is a must-read for all children! • It is well-researched and has child-friendly content • The various topics improve knowledge about the world around us and beyond • The content will cater to curious minds and expand their horizon • The book comprises a glossary of new and difficult terms • It is an excellent selection for gifting and school libraries

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the information in the book lovely, great, and easy to understand. They also describe the visual quality as amazing and visually stimulating. Readers mention the book is beautifully made with lots of photos.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles The Last Ronin #1 Third (3rd) Printing Variant
inStockText: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
author: Various
bookDescription: RETURN TO THE RONIN-VERSE! In the smash-hit miniseries The Last Ronin, readers were taken on a pulse-pounding trek through time—past, present, future—to witness the final gut-wrenching days of the Heroes in a Half Shell. For Michelangelo in particular, the march to his heartbreaking last battle was long and dangerous, taking him from New York City, to Japan, across Asia and Europe, and then back home again to administer final justice against those guilty of killing his family. But what happened during those fateful years when he had only the need for vengeance and Master Splinter’s journal to guide him? What battles did he fight? What hard lessons did he learn? The time has come to find out as original miniseries writers Kevin Eastman and Tom Waltz join artists Ben Bishop ( The Last Ronin) and SL Gallant (G.I. A Real American Hero) to finally reveal what adventures the Last Ronin experienced during his vengeful journey. While in the present, a new master, Casey Marie Jones, prepares her young terrapin students to be the next generation of…Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the book amazing, awesome, and compelling. They describe the story as deep, gritty, and sad. title: Batman 1
author: Tom King
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Superstar writer Tom King’s Batman stories are collected in a new format, including “I Am Gotham,” “The Button,” and more!In 2016, DC Rebirth brought new life to the company’s core line of superhero stories. At the forefront was the relaunched flagship Batman series, written by rising star Tom King, who was joined by top-tier artists including David Finch, Mikel Janín, Mitch Gerads, and Jason Fabok.  Now, these stories return in a hefty new collection, including the compelling story arcs “I Am Gotham” “I Am Suicide,” “Rooftops,” “I Am Bane,” and “The Button,” an unexpected crossover with The Flash! And speaking of unexpected… this volume also collects the Batman/Elmer Fudd Special by King and Lee Weeks, a thoroughly unlikely pairing between DC’s Dark Knight and Looney Tunes’ hapless hunter that yielded one of the most gripping noir tales that comics has seen!This volume collects Batman: Rebirth #1, Batman #1-6, #9-22, The Flash #21-22, and Batman/Elmer Fudd Special #1.

title: All-Star Superman
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Grant Morrison
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: With heartfelt nods and winks to legendary tales, writer Grant Morrison and artist Frank Quitely remind us why Superman is the most renowned character in comic book mythology in this deluxe edition. ADVENTURES OF SUPERMAN! Topsy-turvy madness on the backwards Bizarro planet. A bottled city that proves you can never go home again. A living sun hell-bent on destroying humanity. A world without the Man of Steel. Twelve impossible labors and mere moments to save the Earth. The multiple-award winning ALL-STAR SUPERMAN is an eternal story true to the greatest character from the golden age of comics. Witness the timeless icon—the Man of Steel—in action in this deluxe collection of excitement and acclaim. Featuring all the classic characters Lex Luthor, Jimmy Olsen, Lois Lane, and Bizarro, this deluxe edition collects All-Star Superman #1-12 and Absolute All-Star Superman.

title: Batman: A Death in the Family
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Jim Starlin
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: In 1988, Batman readers were allowed to vote on the outcome of the story... and they decided that Robin should die! Jim Starlin's devastating graphic novel classic left shockwaves throughout the comic book industry, many of which are still felt today! As the second person to assume the role of Batman's sidekick, Jason Todd had a completely different personality than the original Robin. Rash and prone to ignore Batman's instructions, Jason was always quick to act without regard to consequences. In this fatal instance, Robin ignores his mentor's warnings when he attempts to take on the Joker by himself and pays the ultimate price. Driven by anger with Superman by his side, Batman seeks his vengeance as he looks to end the Joker's threat forever.This tale of loss, guilt and brutality is considered one of the most defining pieces in the Dark Knight's mythology. Batman: A Death in the Family collects Batman #426-429.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the story quality good, awesome, and interesting. They say the book is worth the price. Opinions differ on the art quality, with some finding it well-detailed and pops, while others say it's not mind-blowing.

title: PREDATOR VS. WOLVERINE
author: Benjamin Percy
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Worlds collide in the first-ever crossover between the Marvel Universe and the Predator mythos!The bloodthirsty saga you've been waiting for! Wolverine has lived one of the longest and most storied lives in Marvel Comics history. Now witness the untold greatest battles of Logan's life - across the ages, against a Predator! One Yautja seeks the greatest prey in existence - and finds it in Weapon X. From the blood-ridden snows of the Canadian wilderness to the sword-slinging streets of Madripoor, Wolverine and a Predator will destroy everything in their paths on their way to the ultimate victory - or glorious death! Superstar writer Benjamin Percy brings the bloodiest hunters in all of pop culture to their knees! But will Wolverine's adamantium skull join the bones of countless other prey? Or will he prove, once again, that he's the best there is? Collecting PREDATOR VS. WOLVERINE #1-4.

title: Kingdom Come
author: Mark Waid
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: In the near-future world of Kingdom Come, superheroes are ubiquitous, but heroism is rare. After decades as Earth's champions, the members of the Justice League have all retreated out of the public eye, replaced with a new generation of crime-fighters whose brand of justice leaves humanity terrified, rather than inspired. But with the planet's future in jeopardy, Superman, Wonder Woman and Batman must come out of retirement to make one last stand for truth and justice...From comics writer Mark Waid and artist Alex Ross comes this definitive collection of the seminal masterpiece Kingdom Come, with more than 100 pages of sketches, annotations and other behind-the-scenes features.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the artwork great, visually enhancing the story. They appreciate the quality and readability of the book. Readers also mention the writing is interesting and thought-provoking.

title: Transformers Vol. 1: Robots in Disguise (1)
author: Daniel Warren Johnson
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: "In a world dominated by plenty of corporate comics, this Transformers title is a muscle car built in neighborhood garage.” - The Hollywood Reporter  THE TRANSFORMERS JOIN THE ENERGON UNIVERSE! Optimus Prime was supposed to have led the Autobots to victory. Instead, the fate of Cybertron is unknown, and his allies have crash-landed far from home, alongside their enemies—the Decepticons. As these titanic forces renew their war on Earth, one thing is immediately clear: the planet will never be the same. New alliances are struck. Battle lines are redrawn. And humanity’s only hope of survival is Optimus Prime.  Superstar creator Daniel Warren Johnson (Do a Powerbomb, Wonder Woman: Dead Earth), alongside showrunner Robert Kirkman (The Walking Dead, Invincible), reimagines Hasbro’s robots in disguise for a brand-new generation.  Collects TRANSFORMERS #1-6

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the story compelling, cool, and pure. They also describe the art style as vibrant, dynamic, and old school. Readers describe the book as fantastic, amazing, and a great start to this run. They appreciate the meaningful character development and endearing humans.

title: Marvel Comics: Cooking with Deadpool
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Marc Sumerak
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Deadpool brings his inimitable style, foul-mouthed humor, and notorious skill with a blade to the kitchen in this hilarious take on a traditional cookbook, featuring classic recipes with a Deadpool spin and a whole lotta chimichangas.No super hero takes food quite as seriously as Deadpool. In this gorgeously designed cookbook that paid reviewers have described as “glorious” and “the best cookbook I’ve ever read,” Deadpool offers his take on a curated collection of epicurean classics. Narrated by the wisecracking super hero (and sexy master chef) himself, this book also incudes recipes inspired by some of his closest friends/enemies (Here’s lookin’ at you, Spidey) and his favorite meals, including chimichangas, tacos, pancakes, and hamburgers with no pickles.  This comprehensive culinary guide is complete with recipe modification suggestions, illustrations, and mouthwatering full-color photography. This is the ultimate gift for seasoned cooks and Marvel fans alike!

bookDescription: The graphic novel that inspired the hit Warner Bros. motion picture from the Wachowskis, the directors of THE MATRIX films and SPEED RACER.In the near future, England has become a corrupt, totalitarian state, opposed only by V, the mystery man wearing a white porcelain mask who intends to free the masses through absurd acts of terrorism.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the book amazing and well-received. They appreciate the artwork and story quality. title: Batman: One Bad Day Box Set
inStockText: In Stock  Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
author: Tom King
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: The Riddler. Two-Face. The Penguin. Mr. Freeze. Catwoman. Bane. Clayface. Ra's al Ghul. Each villain has their reasons for opposing the Caped Crusader. But were they victims of circumstance who were pushed over the edge, or were they always drawn to darkness?2023 Eisner Nominee - Best Limited Series"You had a bad day and everything changed." In the pages of the iconic story Batman: The Killing Joke, Batman's ultimate foe, The Joker, was changed forever, given new, horrifying definition by the graphic novel that acted as the template for all the character's stories moving forward. Now, 35 years later, some of comics' greatest creators have come together to give that same stunning reexamination and evolution to more of Batman's iconic rogues gallery.This complete box set contains all eight Batman - One Bad Day hardcovers, each spotlighting a new, defining standalone story for Batman's greatest villains, plus a special edition of Batman: The Killing Joke by Alan Moore and Brian Bolland.

title: Doomsday Clock: The Complete Collection
inStockText: In Stock  In stock  In Stock
author: Geoff Johns
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: The world of Watchmen collides with the DC Universe in the most shocking story in DC history! Presented by master storytellers Geoff Johns and Gary Frank--As the Doomsday Clock ticks toward midnight, the DC Universe will encounter its greatest threat: Dr. Manhattan. But nothing is hidden from Manhattan, and the secrets of the past, present, and future will leave ramifications on our heroes' lives forever.NOTHING EVER REALLY ENDS... The world of Watchmen collides with the DC Universe in Doomsday Clock, from Geoff Johns and Gary Frank, the critically acclaimed team behind Shazam!: Origins and Batman: Earth One. Seven years after the events of Watchmen, Adrian Veidt has been exposed as the murderer of millions. Now a fugitive, he has come up with a new plan to&;redeem himself in the eyes of&;the world. The first step?&; Finding &;Dr. Manhattan. Alongside a new Rorschach and the&; never-before-seen &;Mime and Marionette, he&; follows Manhattan's trail to&; the DC Universe, which is&; on the brink of collapse&; as&; international tensions push the "Doomsday Clock"&; ever closer to midnight. Is this all Dr. Manhattan's&; doing?&; Spinning out of Watchmen, DC Universe: Rebirth, &;and &;Batman/The Flash: The Button, Doomsday Clock rewrites the &;past, present,&;and future of the DC Universe and it&; all &;starts here!&; Collects Doomsday Clock&;#1-12.&;

title: Comic Book Storage Box with Comic Book Display Window [Patent Pending]…
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office & School Supplies › Office Storage Supplies › Storage File Boxes
features: Essential For Comic Book Collectors: This sleek black comic book storage box features a clear front pocket that acts as a comic book frame to showcase your collection. The Comic Storage Box measures 15" x 11" x 7.5" and has enough space for up to 200 comics (150-170 bagged and boarded); The comic book organizer will make your comic books look as good in storage as they do in your hands.

Comic Book Display: This is a sturdy comic book display box that lets you protect your comics while you showcase them. Give your collection a comic book case worthy of its value. You no longer have to hide your collection away in plain old white comic short boxes. Bring your comic book collection into the light with this unique Comic Display Box.

Stable, Stackable, and Easy to Lift: The comic box is made from 1500g center boards and blanketed in water-resistant PVC infused polyester. It feels like luggage - sturdy. It will provide maximum protection that stands the test of time. The handles make carrying the comic book case as easy as turning a page and are rated for up to 50 pounds of weight. They can handle a fully loaded comic book organizer with ease. Comic Book short boxes typically weigh 25 lbs when fully loaded.

Removable Lid: Many comic boxes have lids that need to be stored under the box if removed; Others have attached flip tops that dangle loose when open. This comic short box is different; It has a removable, flip-top lid that can affix to it's side. This allows you to leave the box fully open for active use. With our comic display box, you can keep your comic book "to read" pile out in the room with style without an unwieldy attached top dangling off to the side.

Created by a Comic Book Store Owner: Comic books are not just my business, but my passion and lifelong love; This comic book short box is the culmination of years spent in the aisles of my store, understanding what collectors truly want and need from a comic book display that solves their comic book storage needs.
The perfect holiday gift for comic book collectors! Help them make their collection shine with this comic book box and display!

manufacturerAttributes.key: It's Time to Store Your Comics in Style
manufacturerAttributes.value: Generic white comic book storage boxes can provide some protection, but they are a total eyesore. You'll want to keep them out of sight and out of mind. Comic Vision is different. It's for collectors who value presentation. This stylish black box will allow you to showcase your passion for comics in a more pronounced and personal way.

It'll help you organize and store your comics in style while providing protection around the clock. Each box is covered in water-resistant PVC, so your comic books will be shielded against spills, leaks, or humidity-related issues. This high level of protection is especially important in areas prone to dampness or unexpected water exposure.

The large capacity storage box measures 11 x 15 x 7.5 inches and has enough space for up to 150-200 bagged or boarded comic books. This makes it an ideal choice for both casual readers and serious collectors. Its size strikes the perfect balance between capacity and convenience, easily fitting into most shelves or storage spaces.

manufacturerAttributes.key: Marvelous Gift for Comic Book Collectors
manufacturerAttributes.value: For anyone who appreciates comics, this storage box is a gift that shows a deep understanding of their hobby, making it much more meaningful and personal than a generic present. Speaking of gifts, a complimentary copy of the 'The Comic Grading Guide' comes included. This guide will help turn you into a comic grading whiz!

manufacturerAttributes.key: Clear Pocket for Comic Book Display
manufacturerAttributes.value: Sick of the guessing games with standard comic boxes? Ours takes out all the guesswork. It allows you to display a representative comic in the clear pocket on the outside, which will provide a quick reference of what's stored inside - no need to open the box! This will also add some aesthetic appeal to your comic book collection.

Comic Vision is made with 1500g boards, so it’s super sturdy and stackable. This design keeps your comics well protected from physical damage and maximizes space efficiency - you can stack ‘em sky high! Also, the carry handles make it a breeze to transport your collection, whether for reorganizing, sharing with friends, or moving.

The box's flip-top lid detaches and can be attached to the side using the integrated hook-and-loop fasteners. This thoughtful design means there's no need to struggle with placing the lid under a heavy box. Plus, these fasteners aren't just for the lid; they also let you join two boxes side by side, adding extra stability to your storage setup.

manufacturerAttributes.key: Labels Conveniently on the Small Side
manufacturerAttributes.value: When boxes are stored with the small side facing out, these labels become easily visible, so locating specific comics or series is a piece of cake. This is particularly useful when flipping through comics, as it streamlines the process of finding the issue you're looking for without having to pull out and search through multiple boxes.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
It's Time to Store Your Comics in Style 
Generic white comic book storage boxes can provide some protection, but they are a total eyesore. You'll want to keep them out of sight and out of mind. Comic Vision is different. It's for collectors who value presentation. This stylish black box will allow you to showcase your passion for comics in a more pronounced and personal way. 
	
The Protection Your Collection Needs 
It'll help you organize and store your comics in style while providing protection around the clock. Each box is covered in water-resistant PVC, so your comic books will be shielded against spills, leaks, or humidity-related issues. This high level of protection is especially important in areas prone to dampness or unexpected water exposure. 
	
Can Hold 150 Comic Books Comfortably 
The large capacity storage box measures 11 x 15 x 7.5 inches and has enough space for up to 150-200 bagged or boarded comic books. This makes it an ideal choice for both casual readers and serious collectors. Its size strikes the perfect balance between capacity and convenience, easily fitting into most shelves or storage spaces. 
	
Marvelous Gift for Comic Book Collectors 
For anyone who appreciates comics, this storage box is a gift that shows a deep understanding of their hobby, making it much more meaningful and personal than a generic present. Speaking of gifts, a complimentary copy of the 'The Comic Grading Guide' comes included. This guide will help turn you into a comic grading whiz! 
	
Clear Pocket for Comic Book Display 
Sick of the guessing games with standard comic boxes? Ours takes out all the guesswork. It allows you to display a representative comic in the clear pocket on the outside, which will provide a quick reference of what's stored inside - no need to open the box! This will also add some aesthetic appeal to your comic book collection. 
	
Sturdy, Stackable with Carry Handles 
Comic Vision is made with 1500g boards, so it’s super sturdy and stackable. This design keeps your comics well protected from physical damage and maximizes space efficiency - you can stack ‘em sky high! Also, the carry handles make it a breeze to transport your collection, whether for reorganizing, sharing with friends, or moving. 
	
Removable Hook & Loop Fastener Lid 
The box's flip-top lid detaches and can be attached to the side using the integrated hook-and-loop fasteners. This thoughtful design means there's no need to struggle with placing the lid under a heavy box. Plus, these fasteners aren't just for the lid; they also let you join two boxes side by side, adding extra stability to your storage setup. 
	
Labels Conveniently on the Small Side 
When boxes are stored with the small side facing out, these labels become easily visible, so locating specific comics or series is a piece of cake. This is particularly useful when flipping through comics, as it streamlines the process of finding the issue you're looking for without having to pull out and search through multiple boxes.

Each box is covered in water-resistant PVC, so your comic books will be shielded against spills, leaks, or humidity-related issues. This high level of protection is especially important in areas prone to dampness or unexpected water exposure.

items.title: Can Hold 150 Comic Books Comfortably
items.text: The large capacity storage box measures 11 x 15 x 7.5 inches and has enough space for up to 150-200 bagged or boarded comic books. This makes it an ideal choice for both casual readers and serious collectors. Its size strikes the perfect balance between capacity and convenience, easily fitting into most shelves or storage spaces.

items.title: Marvelous Gift for Comic Book Collectors
items.text: For anyone who appreciates comics, this storage box is a gift that shows a deep understanding of their hobby, making it much more meaningful and personal than a generic present. Speaking of gifts, a complimentary copy of the 'The Comic Grading Guide' comes included. This guide will help turn you into a comic grading whiz!

image.name: Marvelous Gift for Comic Book Collectors

items.title: Clear Pocket for Comic Book Display
items.text: Sick of the guessing games with standard comic boxes? Ours takes out all the guesswork. It allows you to display a representative comic in the clear pocket on the outside, which will provide a quick reference of what's stored inside - no need to open the box! This will also add some aesthetic appeal to your comic book collection.

image.name: Clear Pocket for Comic Book Display

items.title: Sturdy, Stackable with Carry Handles
items.text: Comic Vision is made with 1500g boards, so it’s super sturdy and stackable. This design keeps your comics well protected from physical damage and maximizes space efficiency - you can stack ‘em sky high! Also, the carry handles make it a breeze to transport your collection, whether for reorganizing, sharing with friends, or moving.

items.title: Removable Hook & Loop Fastener Lid
items.text: The box's flip-top lid detaches and can be attached to the side using the integrated hook-and-loop fasteners. This thoughtful design means there's no need to struggle with placing the lid under a heavy box. Plus, these fasteners aren't just for the lid; they also let you join two boxes side by side, adding extra stability to your storage setup.

items.title: Labels Conveniently on the Small Side
items.text: When boxes are stored with the small side facing out, these labels become easily visible, so locating specific comics or series is a piece of cake. This is particularly useful when flipping through comics, as it streamlines the process of finding the issue you're looking for without having to pull out and search through multiple boxes.

image.name: Labels Conveniently on the Small Side
Comic vision is a collector's dream

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers like the sturdiness, design, and storage capacity of the storage box. They mention it's very sturdy, adds a nice decorative element, and has plenty of space. Some also appreciate the Velcro on both sides that keeps things nice and secured. Customers also like the ease of assembly.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
CollectorMount Comic Mount Comic - Wall Display & Shelf Stand 
Pack Sizes Available 
1 Pack 
2 Pack

Not Just Comics 
Comic books aren't the only items that work with this mounting system. Other customers have used the Comic Mount for matchbox cars or other packaged toys, children's artwork, books, vinyl records, album covers, graphic novels, magazines, playbills, award certificates, home decor items, and framed products. 
Mount Up What Matters 
Your comics are part of your personality; some helped you define who you are and others made you dream of who you want to be. Your graphic novels deserve to be shared and admired. Whether you want to display your favorite comic on a shelf or your entire collection on a wall, our Comic Mount can handle it. Your friends will love seeing your comics collection and finding out more about who you are. 
What You Get 
Each adjustable Comic Mount mounting system comes with 2 brackets sized 1.313” x 3” x 7.14” (14.28” in total length), 1 carriage bolt & 1 flange nut (10/24 size), and assembly instructions. Wall mounting hardware not included. The transparent, unobtrusive design draws all attention on your comics, making them seem like they float off the wall or hover over the shelf. 
Stylish & Minimalistic 
The Comic Mount is a must for any true fan or collector of comic books. The mount provides a stylish and simple way to display all the keepsakes that mean most in a creative way. 
	
Adjustable & Versatile 
The versatile adjustable mount works with a variety of items. Display your little one's favorite memories, characters, and creations using the comic mounting system. 
	
Easy-To-Install 
The system doesn't stop at keepsakes. It is perfect for artwork, photography, framed items, and more. The mount is easy to install allowing you to create incredible floating displays. 
	
Shelf Stand Option 
No wall space isn't a problem for the Comic Mount. The mount's unique design can be reconfigured into a shelf stand that can be used to display collectibles on any flat surface.

Secure your valuable graded comic shipments in seconds with this innovative fold-over design featuring extra strong Peel & Stick tape. At less than half a pound each and a compact form factor, Gemini Graded Comic Book Mailers minimize the weight and linear dimensions added to your shipment.

title: How To FAIL at Stand-Up Comedy: Avoiding the Pitfalls that Kill a Comic's Career
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Steve Sabo
breadCrumbs: Books › Humor & Entertainment › Humor
bookDescription: PICK UP THIS BOOK BEFORE YOU PICK UP THE MICROPHONEPart instruction manual, part memoir and part cautionary tale, “How to FAIL at Stand-Up Comedy” is a hilarious and sometimes heartbreaking exploration of a 30 year career in stand-up. Sabo pulls no punches while revealing what it’s really like to live the life of a traveling comedian, warts and all. Sabo points out everything you can do wrong in this business with glaring detail and without judgment. Chock full of advice from industry insiders and experts in the field, “FAIL” takes you on the journey from open-miker to seasoned headliner and all the speed bumps in between. You will learn how to get booked into top clubs, how to create perfect promotional material, how to ace an audition, and how to avoid becoming a statistic. You will also learn what jokes NOT to tell, what food to NOT eat at a comedy condo and how careers can be ruined before even picking up the microphone. Sabo doesn’t have his own sitcom or Netflix special; what he does have is a wealth of comedy experience and the scars to prove it. This book is a must read for any aspiring comic, established comedian or fan of stand-up.“Don’t let the title fool you. It’s not about failing to make it as a stand-up comedian. This book is about the experience: learning from your failures, mishaps, surprises and the need to develop a thick skin in order to become successful. Sabo’s writing takes aspiring comedians by the hand and leads them through the ups and downs of what it takes to make a career in this crazy business. This is a view from the comedy trenches.” - Dave Schwensen, author of How To Be A Working Comic and talent coordinator for A&E’s An Evening at the Improv “Steve Sabo literally wrote the book on making mistakes in the comedy business. You name it, he’s effed it up, probably more than once. That’s what makes this book so helpful and entertaining!” –Rob Durham, author of “Don’t Wear Shorts on Stage”

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the book interesting, amazing, and a great reference. They also say it provides helpful tips and tricks to help comics succeed.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Last Ronin
author: Kevin Eastman
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: A New York Times Bestseller! Who is the Last Ronin? In a future, battle-ravaged New York City, a lone surviving Turtle embarks on a seemingly hopeless mission seeking justice for the family he lost. From legendary TMNT co-creators Kevin Eastman and Peter Laird, get ready for the final story of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles three decades in the making!What terrible events destroyed his family and left New York a crumbling, post-apocalyptic nightmare? All will be revealed in this climactic Turtle tale that sees longtime friends becoming enemies and new allies emerging in the most unexpected places. Can the surviving Turtle triumph?Eastman and Laird are joined by writer Tom Waltz, who penned the first 100 issues of IDW's ongoing TMNT series, and artists Esau & Isaac Escorza (Heavy Metal) and Ben Bishop (The Far Side of the Moon) with an Introduction by filmmaker Robert Rodriguez!Collects the complete five-issue miniseries in a new graphic novel, an adventure as fulfilling for longtime Turtles fans as it is accessible for readers just discovering the heroes in a half shell.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
CollectorMount Comic Mount Comic - Wall Display & Shelf Stand 
Pack Sizes Available 
1 Pack 
2 Pack 
3 Pack 
4 Pack 
5 Pack 
Not Just Comics 
Comic books aren't the only items that work with this mounting system. Other customers have used the Comic Mount for matchbox cars or other packaged toys, children's artwork, books, vinyl records, album covers, graphic novels, magazines, playbills, award certificates, home decor items, and framed products. 
Mount Up What Matters 
Your comics are part of your personality; some helped you define who you are and others made you dream of who you want to be. Your graphic novels deserve to be shared and admired. Whether you want to display your favorite comic on a shelf or your entire collection on a wall, our Comic Mount can handle it. Your friends will love seeing your comics collection and finding out more about who you are. 
What You Get 
Each adjustable Comic Mount mounting system comes with 2 brackets sized 1.313” x 3” x 7.14” (14.28” in total length), 1 carriage bolt & 1 flange nut (10/24 size), and assembly instructions. Wall mounting hardware not included. The transparent, unobtrusive design draws all attention on your comics, making them seem like they float off the wall or hover over the shelf. 
Stylish & Minimalistic 
The Comic Mount is a must for any true fan or collector of comic books. The mount provides a stylish and simple way to display all the keepsakes that mean most in a creative way. 
	
Adjustable & Versatile 
The versatile adjustable mount works with a variety of items. Display your little one's favorite memories, characters, and creations using the comic mounting system. 
	
Easy-To-Install 
The system doesn't stop at keepsakes. It is perfect for artwork, photography, framed items, and more. The mount is easy to install allowing you to create incredible floating displays. 
	
Shelf Stand Option 
No wall space isn't a problem for the Comic Mount. The mount's unique design can be reconfigured into a shelf stand that can be used to display collectibles on any flat surface.

manufacturerAttributes.key: It's Time to Store Your Comics in Style
manufacturerAttributes.value: Generic white comic book storage boxes can provide some protection, but they are a total eyesore. You'll want to keep them out of sight and out of mind. Comic Vision is different. It's for collectors who value presentation. This stylish black box will allow you to showcase your passion for comics in a more pronounced and personal way.

It'll help you organize and store your comics in style while providing protection around the clock. Each box is covered in water-resistant PVC, so your comic books will be shielded against spills, leaks, or humidity-related issues. This high level of protection is especially important in areas prone to dampness or unexpected water exposure.

The large capacity storage box measures 11 x 15 x 7.5 inches and has enough space for up to 150-200 bagged or boarded comic books. This makes it an ideal choice for both casual readers and serious collectors. Its size strikes the perfect balance between capacity and convenience, easily fitting into most shelves or storage spaces.

manufacturerAttributes.key: Marvelous Gift for Comic Book Collectors
manufacturerAttributes.value: For anyone who appreciates comics, this storage box is a gift that shows a deep understanding of their hobby, making it much more meaningful and personal than a generic present. Speaking of gifts, a complimentary copy of the 'The Comic Grading Guide' comes included. This guide will help turn you into a comic grading whiz!

manufacturerAttributes.key: Clear Pocket for Comic Book Display
manufacturerAttributes.value: Sick of the guessing games with standard comic boxes? Ours takes out all the guesswork. It allows you to display a representative comic in the clear pocket on the outside, which will provide a quick reference of what's stored inside - no need to open the box! This will also add some aesthetic appeal to your comic book collection.

Comic Vision is made with 1500g boards, so it’s super sturdy and stackable. This design keeps your comics well protected from physical damage and maximizes space efficiency - you can stack ‘em sky high! Also, the carry handles make it a breeze to transport your collection, whether for reorganizing, sharing with friends, or moving.

The box's flip-top lid detaches and can be attached to the side using the integrated hook-and-loop fasteners. This thoughtful design means there's no need to struggle with placing the lid under a heavy box. Plus, these fasteners aren't just for the lid; they also let you join two boxes side by side, adding extra stability to your storage setup.

manufacturerAttributes.key: Labels Conveniently on the Small Side
manufacturerAttributes.value: When boxes are stored with the small side facing out, these labels become easily visible, so locating specific comics or series is a piece of cake. This is particularly useful when flipping through comics, as it streamlines the process of finding the issue you're looking for without having to pull out and search through multiple boxes.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
It's Time to Store Your Comics in Style 
Generic white comic book storage boxes can provide some protection, but they are a total eyesore. You'll want to keep them out of sight and out of mind. Comic Vision is different. It's for collectors who value presentation. This stylish black box will allow you to showcase your passion for comics in a more pronounced and personal way. 
	
The Protection Your Collection Needs 
It'll help you organize and store your comics in style while providing protection around the clock. Each box is covered in water-resistant PVC, so your comic books will be shielded against spills, leaks, or humidity-related issues. This high level of protection is especially important in areas prone to dampness or unexpected water exposure. 
	
Can Hold 150 Comic Books Comfortably 
The large capacity storage box measures 11 x 15 x 7.5 inches and has enough space for up to 150-200 bagged or boarded comic books. This makes it an ideal choice for both casual readers and serious collectors. Its size strikes the perfect balance between capacity and convenience, easily fitting into most shelves or storage spaces. 
	
Marvelous Gift for Comic Book Collectors 
For anyone who appreciates comics, this storage box is a gift that shows a deep understanding of their hobby, making it much more meaningful and personal than a generic present. Speaking of gifts, a complimentary copy of the 'The Comic Grading Guide' comes included. This guide will help turn you into a comic grading whiz! 
	
Clear Pocket for Comic Book Display 
Sick of the guessing games with standard comic boxes? Ours takes out all the guesswork. It allows you to display a representative comic in the clear pocket on the outside, which will provide a quick reference of what's stored inside - no need to open the box! This will also add some aesthetic appeal to your comic book collection. 
	
Sturdy, Stackable with Carry Handles 
Comic Vision is made with 1500g boards, so it’s super sturdy and stackable. This design keeps your comics well protected from physical damage and maximizes space efficiency - you can stack ‘em sky high! Also, the carry handles make it a breeze to transport your collection, whether for reorganizing, sharing with friends, or moving. 
	
Removable Hook & Loop Fastener Lid 
The box's flip-top lid detaches and can be attached to the side using the integrated hook-and-loop fasteners. This thoughtful design means there's no need to struggle with placing the lid under a heavy box. Plus, these fasteners aren't just for the lid; they also let you join two boxes side by side, adding extra stability to your storage setup. 
	
Labels Conveniently on the Small Side 
When boxes are stored with the small side facing out, these labels become easily visible, so locating specific comics or series is a piece of cake. This is particularly useful when flipping through comics, as it streamlines the process of finding the issue you're looking for without having to pull out and search through multiple boxes.

title: Watchmen

bookDescription: Graphic novels to read anywhere: DC Compact Comics collect DC’s bestselling, most iconic stories in a new size!In an alternate world where the mere presence of American superheroes changed history, the US won the Vietnam War, Nixon is still president, and the cold war is in full effect!Considered the greatest graphic novel in the history of the medium, WATCHMEN begins as a murder mystery but soon unfolds into a planet-altering conspiracy.A group of reunited heroes--Rorschach, Nite Owl, Silk Spectre, Dr. Manhattan and Ozymandias--must test the limits of their convictions and ask themselves where the true line is between good and evil.Collects Watchmen #1-12, the complete story.

breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Batman must save Gotham from its newest threat... another vigilante hero!Batman is Gotham City's greatest protector. But now he's not alone. There are two new heroes in town—a pair of masked metahumans with the powers of Superman and a devotion to preserving all that is good about this twisted city. Calling themselves Gotham and Gotham Girl, they’ve saved Batman’s life, fought by his side and learned from his example.But what happens if Gotham’s new guardians go bad? What if they blame the Dark Knight for the darkness that threatens to drown their city?When sinister forces are unleashed that can warp the minds of men and make heroes into monsters, the time will come for Batman and his allies to decide once and for all: Is Gotham a force for good…or an engine of evil?From the blockbuster DC Universe Rebirth event comes Batman Vol. 1: I Am Gotham—the beginning of an all-new saga in the life of the Dark Knight from superstars Tom King (The Human Target, Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow) and David Finch (Forever Evil, Wonder Woman), featuring an all-star cast of creators such as Scott Snyder (Batman: The Court Of Owls), Ivan Reis (Justice League) and Mikel Janín (Justice League Dark)! This great starting-point graphic novel collects Batman: Rebirth #1 and Batman #1-6.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the story awesome, captivating, and thrilling. They also appreciate the fantastic art that pulls them in visually. Readers describe the book as a great start, solid, and fantastic. They say it's a fun read with wonderful new characters. They mention the book is solid for new and old readers alike. Customers also praise the writing quality as great and well-written.

title: Watchmen
inStockText: In Stock  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Alan Moore
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: A New York Times best-seller!In an alternate world where the mere presence of American superheroes changed history, the US won the Vietnam War, Nixon is still president, and the cold war is in full effect!Watchmen begins as a murder-mystery, but soon unfolds into a planet-altering conspiracy. As the resolution comes to a head, the unlikely group of reunited heroes--Rorschach, Nite Owl, Silk Spectre, Dr. Manhattan and Ozymandias--have to test the limits of their convictions and ask themselves where the true line is between good and evil. In the mid-eighties, Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons created Watchmen, changing the course of comics' history and essentially remaking how popular culture perceived the genre. Popularly cited as the point where comics came of age, Watchmen's sophisticated take on superheroes has been universally acclaimed for its psychological depth and realism.Watchmen is collected here in deluxe hardcover, with sketches, extra bonus material and a new introduction by series artist Dave Gibbons.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the story worth reading and fun. They appreciate the stunning, beautiful colors, and dark and gritty artwork. Readers describe the book as beautiful, a perfect edition to their collection, and a great collector's piece. They also mention the characters are interesting. Additionally, they appreciate the insight provided by the sketchbook samples and rough draft sketches.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Have You Been Treating Your Comic Books With The Love And Care They Deserve? 
If you haven’t, it's never too late to start. Like all things printed on paper, comic books may not exactly have been historically made to last forever. And as they age, the inks will fade, the wood pulp will degrade, and the pages will become yellowed and extremely brittle. If you want to preserve your comics, you need to shield them from factors that speed up breakdown, like high levels of moisture and UV light. But that doesn't mean you have to lock them up and never see them again! 
This Comic Book Frame from Komiq will help you show off your prized comics while fending off the elements. 
Durable Frames 
Comic book frames made of MDF and plastic may be readily accessible and cheaper to ship. But the lighter weight and thinner density could make them more prone to cracking, warping, or getting damaged in transit. Your frames need to be sturdy and solid if they're meant to house and protect your valued comic book. Available in Black and White, our pine wood frames are clean, smooth, and exquisitely engineered to stand the test of time. 
Crystal Clear Acrylic 
You’ll find other comic book frames equipped with windows of polycarbonate and glass. But glass shatters easily and will do little to block UV rays, while polycarbonate can be easily chipped and scratched. Instead, we use transparent acrylic panels that are clear, light, and strong. Acrylic is also inherently UV-filtering, which will help protect your comics from quickly yellowing and fading. 
Premium Look & Feel 
No matter the size of your exhibit, you'll want to give your prized pieces the respect they deserve. Wooden frames will always be classic and timeless — and the quality material will effortlessly blend in any style of home décor, from rustic farmhouse to minimalist and modern interiors. A single issue sitting in this pine wood frame will look just as stunning in a gallery as it will acting as a custom centerpiece for your desk. 
More Reasons To Choose Our Comic Book Frames! 
Preservation Made Simple 
The value of a comic book is dependent on its condition. That's why you need to take extra steps to preserve them beyond just putting them behind glass. First, encase your comic book in an archival bag, preferably polyethylene or mylar. Then, lay it flat in the frame against an acid-free board to prevent creasing and crumpling. Finally, seal everything together and mount your setup somewhere nicely dry and away from direct heat and light. 
	
Versatile Installation 
Make a mini gallery with a few frames hanging in a hallway or arranged on floating shelves. Each frame is equipped with sturdy sawtooth hangers for effortless installation. More than just for comic books, they can also effectively display photography and traditional art pieces like oil and watercolor paintings, prints, ink, pencil, or pastel pieces. The inside measurements are 7.28”x10.6”x0.39”. 
	
Made For Art Lovers, By Art Lovers 
Collecting comic books is a tradition rooted in history, culture, and a genuine love for art. Whether you like superheroes, horror stories, fantasy, or science fiction, there's a comic book out there for everyone. And your collection, no matter how big or small, helps ensure that the art form will transcend the generations. These comic book frames make excellent gifts for budding artists, comic fans, and art collectors of all ages. 
	
Comic Sizes by Years 
Golden Age 	7 3/4 x 10 1/2 inches (19.7 x 26.7 cm). Comics published in 1943 up to 1960 	
Silver Age 	7 1/8 x 10 1/2 inches (18.1 x 26.7 cm). Some late Golden Age comics published in 1951 as well as Silver Age comics published as late as 1965, including annuals and 80-page giants published during that period 	
Regular 	7 1/4 x 10 1/2 inches (18.4 x 26.7 cm). Comes published after 1965, including the late Silver Age and Bronze Age comics of the 1970s to mid-1980s 	
Current 	6 7/8 x 10 1/2 inches (17.5 x 26.7 cm). This size accommodates comics published since 1990

title: The Batman Who Laughs
inStockText: In Stock  In stock  In Stock
author: Scott Snyder
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: A New York Times bestselling graphic novel!"A Batman who laughs is a Batman who always wins."He unleashed the Dark Multiverse in the epic series Dark Nights: Metal. Now superstar writer Scott Snyder reunites with acclaimed artist Jock (Batman: Black Mirror) to set that evil alternate reality's deadliest denizen loose in Gotham City--and the original Dark Knight will never be the same!Half Batman. Half Joker. Combining everything that makes the Caped Crusader a hero and the Clown Prince a killer, the Batman Who Laughs is the Dark Multiverse's deadliest criminal mastermind. Now he's come to Gotham to turn Bruce Wayne's home into an incubator for evil.And he hasn't come alone. Emerging from another of the Dark Multiverse's myriad realities comes the Grim Knight. This vicious vigilante will use any weapon at his disposal to ensure those he has marked for death stay down.A war like no other--a war of the Batmen--has begun. As Batman's closest friends, deadliest enemies, and doppelgängers from across the Multiverse get caught in the crossfire, only one question remains: Who will have the last laugh?Discover the answer in The Batman Who Laughs--a terrifying reimagining of one of comics' greatest heroes--and villains--from the premier Batman writer of our time!Collects the full seven-issue miniseries and the one-shot special issue The Batman Who Laughs: The Grim Knight.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the book fantastic, fun, and a good comic book. They also describe the story as riveting, not difficult to follow, and demented. Readers appreciate the art quality, saying it's beautifully drawn. They say it's worth the price and well worth adding to their collection. Opinions are mixed on the dark tone, with some finding it great and gritty, while others say it's not worth Dark Nights Metal.

title: Batman Three Jokers
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
author: Geoff Johns
breadCrumbs: Books › Comics & Graphic Novels › Graphic Novels
bookDescription: Who are the three jokers?Batman doesn't understand how or why, but the fact is certain: the man he has spent a lifetime chasing isn't one man at all. There are three Jokers. Now that he knows the unbelievable truth, Bruce needs real answers. Joined by Barbara Gordon and Jason Todd, two former victims of the Joker's brutality, the Dark Knight is finally on a path to defeat the madman once and for all. Every last one of him.Geoff Johns (Doomsday Clock, Batman: Earth One) and Jason Fabok (Justice League: The Darkseid War) reunite to present one of the most highly anticipated comics events in years! Collects Batman: Three Jokers #1-3.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the story exceptional, interesting, and the best way to experience a comic book. They also appreciate the great artwork and value for money. Opinions are mixed on the pacing, with some finding it great and quick, while others say it's not as interesting as they expected.
